column4: does anybody know how i can add handlers for custom protocols in gnome?
/usr/share/services/ seems to not influence gnome apps
I think you need to use the gconf editor
you might need to add a protocol there - I forget the exact place
there is indeed something (/desktop/url-handlers ) but neither firefox nor epiphany seem to care about those entries ...
hmm.. unfortunately I forget which section I had to edit
yes, but this was a long time ago on gnome 2.4 I think
ohh. ok, on 2.4 i could do it too (;
iirc there was even control-center support for it then. but in 2.10 that seems to be all gone
yes, in some ways gm=nome is going backwards
overall i am pretty pleased. its a huge project. i guess some regressions are unavoidable
got it. needs to be entered via about:config in either firefox or epiphany
